__e: To save my son, I would slaughter an entire army.

And slaughtered all the men that had held him captive for so many years.
They responded by taking weapons the name of the Lord killing those hostile to God. Not spared anyone.
It's living that's hard when all you ever cared about has been butchered or raped.

They're like animals... and I slaughtered them like animals!
and sat peacefully, as we slaughtered them.

Yeah, and they got slaughtered, which means that this new group is even worse.
